titles.title: To amend title 11 of the United States Code to establish a priority for the payment of claims for retiree health benefits in liquidation cases under chapters 7 and 11.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy law to establish a payment priority for retiree health benefit claims, with an aggregate limitation of $10,000 multiplied by the relevant number of former employees.
